description:
The new Pagoda Tour 106 C2 is possibly the most capable touring ski that DPS has ever designed. Targeted at advanced and expert skiers who value a ski-to-snow connection and directional turning style. The second generation of Pagoda tour skis uses a new platform for more stability, durability, and a step forward in sustainability.

  • Carbon sandwich construction is light, torsionally stiff, strong, and powerful
  • Improved dampness and smoothness make the skis ask for more speed even when the conditions get choppy
  • Layered ash, paulownia, aspen and foam core for power, energy and dampness
  • Textured nylon top sheet is snowphobic
  • C2 utilizes a longer turn radius to improve the ski’s ability to attack the fall line in steeper terrain
  • Third Rail Sidewall Technology uses bio-based microalgae formulated for its dampening characteristics, bend strength, and impact resistance
  • Wide profile Rockwell 48 steel edges provide excellent edge control without sacrificing a playful, floaty ride
  • World Cup Race base is fast and hard for exceptional performance
name: DPS Skis Pagoda 106C2 Tour Skis - Unisex
